summary: A mighty brave follower that can be found in Whiterun\'s The Bannered Mare chilling in the balcony section. He comes with goodies, and a mighty loud battle cry! Have fun adventuring with this guy!
descriptionHtml:
This follower is dedicated to the infamous WOW meme, Leeroy Jenkins. He\'s level 100, super beast, foolhardy, and doesn\'t affect your sneak theif ways! Made him because my pack mules kept dying on me, or could barely get a scratch on a falmer.

You can find him chilling in The Bannered Mare in Whiterun, on the balcony with access thru the bedroom! Enjoy and please send feedback me way! I would truely appreciate it since this in my first mod! Working on his carrying load to be heavier and more colorful dialogue! ^_^


PS....comes with his famous battle cries, so beware if wearing headphones!!! lol I almost jumped out of my seat the first time I heard him roar! HAVE FUN!

update 5/8/12: Leeroy now equipped with new items:
10 Black Soul Gems Filled
1 Spell Tome of Invisibility
1 Ring of Revival
1 Necklace of Peerless Sure Grip
1 Pair of Sheogorath Boots
1 Sheogorath Outfit
and of course:10 Grilled Chicken Breasts!!! (they were all out of fried >.<)


update 5/9/12: Leeroy now yells when attacking, bashing, and power attacks! Even yells while bow shooting!
Also when you initially click on him, or say \"What\'s up?\",  he responds, \"LEEEEERRROOOYYY
JENKINNNNSSSS!!!!! ^_^
I added the Spell Tome Invisibility bc I couldn\'t find it anywhere for the life of me! So call it a cheat, and FYI...u need enough magic to use it. Have fun otherwise!!!
author: BabyNuggets
